title: FUCK RIOT
body:
CHAT BANNING ME FOR TELLING PEOPLE TO KILL THEMSELVES!

FUCK OFF RIOT, NOW I'M JUST GONNA FEED

SUCK MY DICK %%%%S, MIGHT AS WELL PERMA BAN ME IF I CAN'T TALK SHIT

FUCK YOU RIOT, KYS!

CYA %%%%S, I'LL ENJOY MY BAN!

THANK YOU VERY FUCKING MUCH!

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Lachlan2525,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=V3zKREAQ,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-09-22T12:33:10.931+0000) CHAT BANNING ME FOR TELLING PEOPLE TO KILL THEMSELVES!

You sound surprised. Pretty obvious that one is against their rules.

> FUCK OFF RIOT, NOW I'M JUST GONNA FEED

Let's be honest, you were probably already feeding which led you to become so salty in the first place ;)

> SUCK MY DICK %%%%S, MIGHT AS WELL PERMA BAN ME IF I CAN'T TALK SHIT

There is a difference between talking shit, and just being a complete dick

> THANK YOU VERY FUCKING MUCH!

I would also like to thank Riot very much for this one.
UPDATE BOIS, I'VE BEEN PERMA BANNED GG
Why are people not upvoting this obvious act of heroism against a corrupt organisation?
WE NEED TO STAND UP FOR THIS BULLSHIT
Lmao he thinks youre being legit {{champion:117}}
Lachlan2525 is now the Keemstar of the OCE Server
Lachlan please turn that computer of yours off and go to bed! It's past your curfew young man!
Can you speak up or are your parents going to beat you if you are loud? HEHE XD
